an3.114:1: "Bhikkhus, the manifestation of threepersonsis rare in the world. What three? () The manifestation of a Tathāgata, an Arahant, a Perfectly Enlightened One is rare in the world. (2) A person who teaches the Dhamma and discipline proclaimed by the Tathāgata is rare in the world. (3) A grateful and thankful person is rare in the world. The manifestation of these threepersonsis rare in the world."
